page.title: 18HEALTH NETT'M OLD FOLK
page.content: Over 60's are well provided for, thanks to Age Concern,with 15 flats in Church View,All Saints Lane for warden assisted accomodation.Those in 8 bungalows nearby,and 20 on Scothern Hill needs less help.Four flats in the barn,The Green,provide for those who need little help.Linelands,with 45 bed sitting rooms,has 2 wardens and nursing staff for those in greatest need.There pension pays for their accomodation and food,leaving enough for pocket money.On Tuesdays folk from surrounding villages meet socially in the morning at the Old School.There, too,meets The Mable Briggs Memorial Luncheon Club every Thursday,Nettleham Residents enjoying menus like braised steak,onions,mushrooms,peas,roast potatoes and spotted dick,prepared & cooked by many local helper.home visits,parties,and mobility provided.
